citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:08 PM on 20-
August-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the phone numbers on file and
knocking on the door of the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:08 PM on 20-
August-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the phone numbers on file and 
knocking on the door of the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
